name: Carrying the Burden
description:
From the 100 Days of Drawing Series //

This 2021 personal challenge started in early March. The goal, to produce a finished piece, everyday, for 100 days  // This is day 22 of that challenge // 

"Judgment gave her a burden. It would be hers to carry; it would be her weapon. She will hunt down Judgement, the cursed totem, and return the burden with a vengeance"
